Container.Name: github-backup
Container.Overview: Like to maintain your own data? Automatically backup your github account to your Unraid server on a schedule.
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please consider donating.

Config.Name: Token
Config.Description: Get your token from https://github.com/settings/tokens, see the support page for more details.

Config.Name: Schedule
Config.Description: How often to sync in seconds (eg. 3600 for 1h, 21600 for 6h, 43200 for 12h, 86400 for 24h)

Config.Name: Backup location
Config.Description: Set the location of your github backups. Please note that the default will create a backup share if it does not exist and you don't change it.
